root.name: Suikoden I+II
root.description: Despite the fact the Konami has not brought this collection of cult favorites outside of Japan, they have, however, released the first Suikoden on the Playstation Network on December 23, 2008. No news, however, if Suikoden II will be arriving on the service. Suikoden II had a limited print run and no reprinting and, therefore, commands a high price on the reselling market.
